name: w8mngr-2020
description: w8mngr utilizing Netlify's functions and a React SPA

scripts.develop:build: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up
scripts.develop:init: npm run develop:init:dropdb && npm run develop:init:createdb && docker-compose exec -u postgres db psql -d w8mngr-dev -c 'CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS hstore;' && docker-compose exec -u postgres db psql -d w8mngr-dev -f /db-tools/initial_structure.sql
scripts.develop:init:dropdb: docker-compose exec -u postgres db psql -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS "w8mngr-dev";'
scripts.develop:init:createdb: docker-compose exec -u postgres db psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE "w8mngr-dev";'
scripts.develop:test:all: docker-compose exec test npm run test:all
scripts.test:all: npm run test:shared && npm run test:api
scripts.test:shared: TS_NODE_PROJECT='tsconfig.api.json' npm run test -- shared/**/*.test.[jt]s shared/**/**/*.test.[jt]s
scripts.test:init:dropdb: docker-compose exec -u postgres db psql -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS "w8mngr-test";'
scripts.test:init:createdb: docker-compose exec -u postgres db psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE "w8mngr-test";'
scripts.test:init: npm run test:init:dropdb && npm run test:init:createdb && docker-compose exec -u postgres db psql -d w8mngr-test -c 'CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS hstore;' && docker-compose exec -u postgres db psql -d w8mngr-test -f /db-tools/initial_structure.sql

author: Ryan M. Poe
